    • apptAlert

      public void apptAlert()
      This methods alerts the user that there is an appointment occurring in the next 15 minutes. It does this by calling the database and comparing the stored data times to the local times. It also displays the errors in Fnglish or French based on locale.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resource)
      This calls the language resources to handle the French/English differences in error messages. Also set the whole form to the desired language.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resource -
